ui.language.label: Lang
ui.dashboard.title: Tablo aprantisaj
ui.nav.title: Sote rapid
ui.settings.title: Anviwònman lekti
ui.objectives.title: Objektif ak estrateji
ui.siop.title: Estrateji SIOP
ui.helpers.title: Èd pèsonaj
ui.section.paused: Pwogrè kanpe. Peze Rekòmanse pou kontinye.
ui.mcq.correct: Bon travay! Se sa ki kòrèk.
ui.dragMatch.instructions: Mete chak etap nan plas li.
ui.dragMatch.incorrect: Gen kèk ki pa bon. Eseye ankò.
messages.stopped: Pwogrè kanpe. Ou ka rekòmanse nenpòt lè.
episode1.title: Batay Rekreyasyon
episode1.subtitle: Demonstrasyon motè epizòd
episode1.siop.strategy1: Kreye baz ak vizyèl ak langaj amikal.
episode1.siop.strategy2: Ankouraje pale ak kesyon an pè.
episode1.siop.strategy3: Bay kad fraz pou ede ekriti.
episode1.objectives.language1: Sèvi ak mo lòd pou eksplike yon estrateji.
episode1.characters.lee.name: Lee
episode1.characters.lee.tip2: Sèvi ak pawòl dous lè w reponn.
episode1.characters.tee.name: Tee
episode1.characters.tee.tip1: Kanpe epi respire anvan ou aji.
episode1.characters.tee.tip2: Mande yon zanmi oswa yon granmoun si w bezwen.
episode1.sections.vocab.title: Vokabilè
episode1.sections.vocab.summary: Aprann mo kle yo avan istwa a.
episode1.sections.vocab.simplified: Aprann de mo pou istwa a.
episode1.sections.story.title: Istwa
episode1.sections.story.summary: Li kijan Lee ak Tee rezoud yon konfli.
episode1.sections.story.simplified: Yon vèsyon pi kout nan istwa a.
episode1.sections.practice.title: Pratik
episode1.sections.practice.summary: Mete etap yo pou bati estrateji a.
episode1.sections.check.title: Tcheke
episode1.sections.check.summary: Montre sa ou konnen ak yon kestyon rapid.
episode1.sections.reflect.title: Reflechi
episode1.sections.reflect.simplified: Ekri yon fraz sou estrateji a.
episode1.vocab.respect.definition: Montre swen ak pawòl ou ak aksyon ou.
episode1.vocab.respect.example: Nan istwa a, Lee montre respè lè li koute.
episode1.vocab.conflict.example: Konfli rekreyasyon an kòmanse pandan jwèt la.
episode1.story.p1: Lakou a gen anpil bri. Lee ak Tee vle jwe menm jwèt la.
episode1.story.p2: Yo kanpe, respire, epi sèvi ak estrateji kat etap la pou rezoud konfli a.
episode1.story.p2.simple: Yo respire epi sèvi ak estrateji a.
episode1.check.prompt: Ki etap ki vini apre ou kanpe epi respire?
episode1.reflect.prompt: Ekri sou yon fwa ou te rezoud yon pwoblèm ak respè.
